Package fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.software.interfaces

Interface RequestSubmissionHandlerI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationVM, RequestDispatcher
    public interface RequestSubmissionHandlerI
    The interface RequestSubmissionHandlerI defines the component internal services to receive and execute requests.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : May 4, 2015

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void acceptRequestSubmission​(RequestI r)
      accept the request r and execute it.
      void acceptRequestSubmissionAndNotify​(RequestI r)
      accept the request r, execute it and notify its termination.
